long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Touch Ahead Software develops cutting edge SaaS solutions.  Touch Ahead's premier product EquityTouch™ is a cutting edge, web-based CRM solution enabling organizations to intelligently manage new business opportunities.  Equity Touch™ sets a new web application standard; delivering the best performance, the most relevant features, in a completely customizable interface, with unrivaled ease and speed.
